```py
import numpy as np
import plotly.graph_objects as go

def parabola_3d(x, y):
    z = x ** 2 + y ** 2
    return z

x = np.linspace(-1, 1, 50)
y = np.linspace(-1, 1, 50)
xv, yv = np.meshgrid(x, y)
z = parabola_3d(xv, yv)

fig = go.Figure(data=[go.Surface(z=z, x=x, y=y)])
fig.write_html("file.html")
```
